short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the new X logos back to the original bird logo from twitter. Now with support for tweetdeck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension changes the new X logos on twitter back to the original bird on the main twitter screen and favicon, also now changing back the text on the tweet button. Now with support for tweetdeck.

Twitter now is not showing the button to read quote retweets from other users. I've added a button similar to what we had in twitter to see retweets, quotes, likes
